skillTree.name: Disc of Tzeentch
skillTree.description: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.

skillTree.name: Burning Chariot
skillTree.description: Hurtling across the realms like incandescent meteors, Burning Chariots bring Tzeentch's emissaries to the foe.

skillTree.name: Invulnerable Through Change
skillTree.description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Hates Nurgle
skillTree.description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Favour of the Raven God
skillTree.description: Tzeentchâ€™s gifts are yours to command!

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -5 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Deplorably Degenerate
skillTree.description: Immorality is subjective.

skillTree.name: Enact True Change
skillTree.description: The Great Schemer brings ruin to all.

skillTree.name: Tzeentch's Many Glories
skillTree.description: Just as planned.

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

skillTree.name: We are the Elite
skillTree.description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

Armour: +1 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +3 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Laboratory
skillTree.description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Pinioned
backgroundSkills.description: Blessed with the transformative boons of Tzeeneth, this one can travel further by his feathered wings, whether they be figurative or literal.

backgroundSkills.name: Channeller
backgroundSkills.description: This one has become the conduit through which the Great Conspirator weaves His sorcerous webs, affecting glorious Change through magical means.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Corrupter
backgroundSkills.description: This one seeks to sow the seeds of confusion, dissent and dishonesty, for such are the insidious ways of the Changer.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy missile resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Keymaster
backgroundSkills.description: "Are you the Gatekeeper?"

backgroundSkills.name: Magic Waves
backgroundSkills.description: Magic is everywhere, endless waves.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to all spells
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Strong Barrier
backgroundSkills.description: Nothing can pass through.

backgroundSkills.name: Warp Speed
backgroundSkills.description: Twisted magic never stops.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Horrors of Tzeentch
backgroundSkills.description: What are we? Your scholars claim we exist only to tempt you, yet in a very real way we are you.
